allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add UUID4 id fields to Element and StructuredPrompt classes

This commit adds unique identifier fields to both Element and 
StructuredPrompt classes to simplify JSON serialization and enable
easier tracking of parent/child relationships.

Changes:
- Added uuid import and field to dataclasses imports
- Added id field to Element dataclass with UUID4 default factory
- Added _id field to StructuredPrompt.__init__ with UUID4 generation
- Added id property to StructuredPrompt for public access

All elements (Static, StructuredInterpolation, ListInterpolation,
ImageInterpolation) now receive unique UUIDs upon construction.
Each StructuredPrompt instance also gets its own unique UUID.

This change is backward compatible and doesn''t affect existing
functionality.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(do echo "=== $nb ===" uv run jupyter nbconvert --execute --to notebook --inplace --ExecutePreprocessor.timeout=60 "$nb")
